original_text: So Lot went out of his house. He spoke to the men who would marry his daughters. He said to them, ‘Hurry! Leave this city now, because the Lord has decided to destroy it.’ But the men did not believe Lot. They thought he was not being serious.
korean_text: 롯이 나가서 그 딸들과 결혼할 사위들에게 말하여 이르기를 여호와께서 이 성을 멸하실 터이니 너희는 일어나 이 곳에서 떠나라 하되 그의 사위들은 농담으로 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: So Lot went out of his house.
He spoke to the men who would marry his daughters.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 딸들과 결혼할 남자들에게 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: because the Lord has decided to destroy it.'
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 그것을 파괴하기로 결정하셨기 때문입니다.'

sentences.original_text: But the men did not believe Lot.
They thought he was not being serious.
